placement-page.title: Placements
placement-page.description: See an overview of all your placements here.

modal-create-placement.title: Create new placement
modal-create-placement.description: Here you can create a new placement.

modal-update-placement.title: Update placement
modal-update-placement.description: Here you can update a placement.

modal-import.title: Import placements
modal-import.description: Add your placements quickly and easily by importing one or more Excel files.
modal-import.placement-error-sub: We could not import all placements. Placements marked with a red icon contain errors or already exist. Fix any issues in the file and try again for the marked locations.
modal-import.file-example-sub: See how the file should be structured
modal-import.invalid-data-toast: Could not import {{filename}}. Check the files data and try again.
